name: Getaway Car
description:
You’ve finally worked up the guts to rob that bank like you’ve always talked about. Now, evade the cops as long as possible! Weave through traffic and honk (if you must) until your actions finally catch up with you.

Instructions
  • Both grip buttons - steer
  • Right trigger - accelerate
  • A - honk to move traffic
  • Up/Down Thumbsticks - adjust height
Development

Getaway Car was developed using A-Frame and Blender.

Credits

Devmode

  • Programming
  • Game Design
  • SFX
